page.title: 11LEISURE IN NEWRY.
page.content: Newry Sports Centre was opened in 1984.It is in Patrick St.on the site of the old cattle and pig market.It is a large multi-purpose complex costing Â£1,250,000 and which took one and a half years to build.Approximately 1,800 people use the Sports Centre every week for many different activities including archery,skittles, basketball,bowls,badminton,squash, table-tennis,handball,raquetball, karate,judo,kungfu,keep-fit,gymnastics aerobics,indoor-football,indoor gaelic football,indoor hockey,athletics, volleyball,tennis,weight-training and boxing.The Centre has a manager and staff of fifteen.
